text: Size matters not. Look at me. Judge me by my size, do you? Hmm? No. And well you should not. For my ally is the Force, and a powerful ally it is.
author: Yoda

text: I am a Jedi, like my father before me.
author: Luke Skywalker

text: I want to come with you to Alderaan. There's nothing for me here now. I want to learn the ways of the Force and become a Jedi like my father
author: Luke Skywalker

text: You still have much to learn, my young apprentice.
author: Qui-Gon Jinn

text: The Force is what gives a Jedi his power. It's an energy field created by all living things. It surrounds us and penetrates us. It binds the galaxy together.
author: Obi-Wan Kenobi
